title: The Pedler
marks:
Signature, Title and Inscription

LLC, on back,  at right edge, in black: [R / H]; at bottom edge o
description: old man with large nose and very long beard, wearing glasses, black pointed cap, and patched tunic, with a pack on his back and a tall walking stick, walking down a path in a landscape; three trees with thin trunks at right; another tree at left; swirling sky
creditline: Gift of Gerald Ray Nelson and Joanne Hogan Nelson
